column1: ROME – A game of smoke and mirrors : this is how Italy ’s current electoral campaign appears – both to Italians and the wider world.

column1: The Democratic chairman of the House of Representatives budget committee, Leon E. Panetta, described the package as " gimmickry " and accused the administration of using " smoke and mirrors " in order to finance its tax cuts and spending initiatives.
